snippet: KAUFMAN--Robert. The Harmonie Club notes with sorrow the passing of our honored member Robert Kaufman. We extend our heartfelt condolences to his entire family. Philip R. Cowen President The Harmonie Club 1/3
lead_paragraph: KAUFMAN--Robert. The Harmonie Club notes with sorrow the passing of our honored member Robert Kaufman. We extend our heartfelt condolences to his entire family. Philip R. Cowen President The Harmonie Club 1/3
